messages.title: GIVE ME AND MY CANDIDATE YOUR VOTE ON THURSDAY 8TH JUNE AND I WILL:
messages.content: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country. Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future. Always stand up for you and your family
Don't risk our future at this crucial moment in history with a vote for anyone else. Back me on Thursday 8th June to lead Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Wants to leave the EU and is committed to making a success of Brexit. Will support the wishes of his constituents.

issues.brexitEurope: Wants to leave the EU and is committed to making a success of Brexit. Will support the wishes of his constituents.
issues.economy: Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future.

leaflet.personalStatement: Andrew Lee was born in Pontefract and has worked and lived in Yorkshire all his life.

endorsements.endorsement: Back me on Thursday 8th June to lead Britain.

quotes.text: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country. Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future. Always stand up for you and your family

leaflet.additionalNotes: Election Communication from Normanton Pontefract And Castleford with promotional material for Tesco on the back.
